rukus.text: daeji wiui modeun geos-eun myeolmanghadoe
geudae junim-eun yeong-wonhasa gwonneung gwa yeong-gwang-eulo chungmanhasinila
neohuineun neohui junim-ui eunhe jung-eoneu geos-eul geoyeoghagessneunyo
haneul-e issneun geosgwa daejie issneun modeun geos-i geubunkke guhani geubun-eun maeil saeloun yeong-gwang-eul haenghasido da
neohuineun neohui junim-ui eunhye jung eoneu geos-eul geoyeoghagessneunyo
god hananimkkeseo neohui du muli ui ildeul-eul haegyeolhalila

yeongmawa ingan-ui muliyeo neohui ga haneulgwa daejiui yeong-yeog-eul beos-eonal su issdamyeon beos-eona bola gwonneung-i ju eojiji anihagoneun beos-eonaji moshalila

hwayeomgwa yeongiga neohui dumu li wie ileuge doelila geuttae neohuineun neohui seuseuloleul bohohal su eobsnani

haneul-i bunlidoego saeppalgan jang mimich saegkkal-i doenani

joeindeul-eun geudeul-ui oehyeong-eulo allyeojige doeni geudeul-ui meoliwa bal deul-i butjabhige doelila

igeos-i balo joeindeul-i geoyeog han jiog-imae
deulkkeulhneun tteugeoun mul sog-eseo geudeul-eun banghwanghanola
